mapper.select: SELECT rnum,free_no,title,btm.nick,time_posted,hits FROM( SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY free_no DESC) AS rnum, free_no,title,to_char(time_posted,'YYYY.MM.DD') as time_posted,hits,id FROM free_board ) fb INNER JOIN bt_member btm ON fb.id=btm.id WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNumber} AND #{endRowNumber}
SELECT free_no,title,content,nick,member_type,to_char(time_posted,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:Mi') as time_posted,hits,image FROM free_board fb INNER JOIN bt_member btm ON fb.id=btm.id WHERE free_no=#{freeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE free_board SET title=#{title},content=#{content} WHERE free_no=#{freeNo}
